src.models package¶

Submodules¶

src.models.predict_model module¶

predict_model.py¶

param model

‘xgb’, ‘rf’ or ‘gb’

type model

String

This package contains function to predict application_test with 3 differents models

src.models.predict_model.main(model)[source]¶

retrieve the model and predict labels of application_test

Parameters

model – model selected

src.models.train_model module¶

train_model.py¶

param model

‘xgb’, ‘rf’ or ‘gb’

type model

String

This package contains function to train 3 differents models, store them locally and on mlflow

src.models.train_model.eval_metrics(actual, pred, loaded_model, X_test)[source]¶

compare prediciton and actual value with different metrics to check the accuracy of the model

Parameters

  • actual (List) – Actual value of the target feature of test set

  • pred (List) – Predictions of the target feature using the test set

  • loaded_model – model selected to check the metrics

  • X_test – useful to calculate auc score

Returns

auc, recall, precision, f1, matrix

src.models.train_model.fetch_processed(data_path)[source]¶

fetch the data that was processed in make data and create training and test sets

Parameters

data_path (String) – location of the dataset

Returns

training and test sets

Return type

2 DataFrame, 2 List

src.models.train_model.gb_fit_model(X_train, y_train, gb_model)[source]¶

fit a gradient boosting model to the training data

Parameters

  • X_train (DataFrame) – data used to train the model

  • y_train (List) – target feature

  • gb_model (GradientBoostingClassifier) – GradientBoostingClassifier model

Returns

GradientBoostingClassifier fitted with gridsearchCV

Return type

GradientBoostingClassifier

src.models.train_model.main(model)[source]¶

Trains the model and test their accuracy on the retrieved data write it back to file and store the trained model

Parameters

model – model selected

src.models.train_model.mlflow_train(model, X_train, y_train, X_test, y_test, fit_function)[source]¶

Fit the model and evaluate the accuracy of the model, model and metrics are saved on mlflow

Parameters

  • model – Model selected

  • fit_function – fit function depending on the selected model

src.models.train_model.model_definition(preprocessor, app_train)[source]¶

define the 3 ML model, XGBoost Classifier, Random Forest Classifier, Gradient Boosting

Parameters

  • preprocessor (ColumnTransformer) – ColumnTransformer to handle onehotencoding

  • app_train – need the y.mean() to add a scale_pos_weight to make it balanced

Returns

3 models of ML

Return type

XGBClassifier, RandomForestClassifier, GradientBoostingClassifier

src.models.train_model.rf_fit_model(X_train, y_train, rf_model)[source]¶

fit a random forest model to the training data

Parameters

  • X_train (DataFrame) – data used to train the model

  • y_train (List) – target feature

  • rf_model (RandomForestClassifier) – RandomForestClassifier model

Returns

RandomForestClassifier fitted with gridsearchCV

Return type

RandomForestClassifier

src.models.train_model.xgb_fit_model(X_train, y_train, xgb_model)[source]¶

fit a xgb model to the training data

Parameters

  • X_train (DataFrame) – data used to train the model

  • y_train (List) – target feature

  • xgb_model (XGBClassifier) – XGBClassifier model

Returns

XGBClassifier fitted with gridsearchCV
